title: T206 Ungraded Cards for sale Cobb Bat on shoulder, Tris Speaker, Joe Tinker portrait.
author: Michael McGuffin

posts.post_title: T206 Ungraded Cards for sale Cobb Bat on shoulder, Tris Speaker, Joe Tinker portrait.
posts.post_content:
I am parting with a few of my T206 cards, for sale I have some ungraded cards.
Cobb bat on shoulder, Joe Tinker portrait, Tris Speaker.  All cards are ungraded and in poor-fair condition but a great way to start out a collection or pick up a HOF card for a good price.   Please email me for pictures and I will try to get them to you as soon as possible.  [url]michael.mcguffin@hotmail.com[/url]

Cobb - 475.00
Speaker - 200.00
Tinker - 90.00

Email sent regarding Cobb and Speaker.

Matt

Cobb is sold, Speaker and Tinker are still available if interested.

Thank you!

Both Tinker and Speaker cards have Piedmont backs.

Thanks!

Speaker and Tinker cards still available, last offer......

Speaker 175.00

Tinker portrait 75.00

Email for pictures.

Thank you!
